name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: WTR for World of Warships Forum

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Colors players' nicknames based on their WRT or ProAlfa ranking. Displays the name of the clan of the player

Displays the name of the clan of the player
